title: Which are cheap best Chinese smartphone brands? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alcatel, Xiaomi and Oppo. These phones has beat the budget phone price with the features of high end quality phones. Just because they're manufacturers are China they'll take time to beat Apple and Samsung. But Quality wise worth each and every penny. Best phones are Xiaomi. Than Oppo and than Alcatel. Enjoy the smartphone Era.
If you don't care about brand name, then Meizu is the best when it comes to this, the region smartphone champion of China, offering low price for great value smartphones
